entities.name: alice longbottom
entities.description: A person in the photograph who is the image of her son Neville.

relationships.description: Harry is looking at a photograph where Moody is pointing at himself.
Moody and Dumbledore are standing beside each other in the photograph.
Moody and Dedalus Diggle are standing beside each other in the photograph.
Moody is in the same picture as Marlene McKinnon.
Frank Longbottom and Alice Longbottom are spouses.
Neville is the son of Alice Longbottom.
Marlene McKinnon and Frank Longbottom are in the same picture.
Marlene McKinnon and Alice Longbottom are in the same picture.
